coded_answer.p: A few days ago I went to the Circle theatre to see a musical show which it showsis showing in your theatre now. Also itIt made me very disappointdisappointed. There are several reasons that I was not happy about the musical.
The first one I am going to complaintcomplain about is the actor. I could not see Danny Brook during the show. There was ana different actor instead of him.

Secondly, the times, it's availableon at 14.30 and 19.30 so I choosechose 19.30. However, it was deleieddelayed and it started at 20.15. Also, I had a student identification card to discountget a discount on the ticket price but it was unavilableunavailable to discountdiscounts were unavailable. The theatre restaurant was closed after the show, they said funds arehad runnrun out.
Those are totally unexpectableunacceptable so I presume that I would like to get paid for my ticket cost. I ask you to transfortransfer money into this account. Barclays bank 1010-10 1234567
How has modern technology changed your daily life?

First of all it's difficult say what exactly modern technology is now but I can say for sure it'sit keepkeeps developing and much better than the past. Think about the conputercomputer, the speed of conputercomputercomputers is much faster than before. I even couldn'tcouldn't even imagine our p.c cancould be that fast.
Also T.Vs, I guess that I was notwould not have been able to watch colour T.V if I was born in 1960. T.V colour only consistconsisted of white and black.
NowdaysNowadays, the technology is keepkeeps developdeveloping and the better technology gives us an easier life.
Another example, the internetInternet. This is a revolution which has changed our daily life.
You can havedo a shopping on the internetInternet and it might be the fastest way to gather any information you would like to searchfind.
However, it also cancan also make our life very lazy. This is one other important thing to remember.
People who have their own car, they don't attempt to walk on foot even if it is a short distance.
The improvement of technology can makes our life easy and in the other wayon the other hand it also cancan also makesmake our life lazy.
